title: Liam Maldoni
subtitle: Matt 2:13-15 says that, just after Jesus' birth, Joseph took him and Mary to Egypt, seeking refuge from Herod, who sought to kill them. If this Gospel is historically accurate, it means Jesus wasn't just an immigrant but also a refugee (a person who flees and seeks refuge). pic.twitter.com/b2Rr4alkUJ

subtitle: @OzRefugeeCounc is calling on all Australians to make a New Year's resolution that counts, by signing up to the Year of Welcome.
